segment.target: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 2.5

segment.source: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 2.5
segment.target: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 2.5

segment.source: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 2.5
segment.target: Monitoring and Reporting BitLocker Compliance with MBAM 2.5

segment.source: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 2.5 provides several reports that you can use to monitor BitLocker usage and compliance activities in your enterprise.
segment.target: Microsoft BitLocker Administration and Monitoring (MBAM) 2.5 provides several reports that you can use to monitor BitLocker usage and compliance activities in your enterprise.

segment.source: Reports for the MBAM Stand-alone topology and the MBAM Configuration Manager Integration topology differ in the following ways:
segment.target: Reports for the MBAM Stand-alone topology and the MBAM Configuration Manager Integration topology differ in the following ways:

segment.source: In the Stand-alone topology, you view reports in the Administration and Monitoring Website.
segment.target: In the Stand-alone topology, you view reports in the Administration and Monitoring Website.

segment.source: In the Configuration Manager Integration topology, you view reports in the Configuration Manager console, with one exception: you continue to view the Recovery Audit report from the Administration and Monitoring Website.
segment.target: In the Configuration Manager Integration topology, you view reports in the Configuration Manager console, with one exception: you continue to view the Recovery Audit report from the Administration and Monitoring Website.

segment.source: The names of the reports differ slightly between the two topologies.
segment.target: The names of the reports differ slightly between the two topologies.

segment.source: Visit the following links for the names and descriptions of the reports for each topology.
segment.target: Visit the following links for the names and descriptions of the reports for each topology.

segment.source: Viewing MBAM 2.5 Reports – Stand-alone topology
segment.target: Viewing MBAM 2.5 Reports – Stand-alone topology

segment.source: The following topics describe the reports and explain how to generate and view them in the Administration and Monitoring Website.
segment.target: The following topics describe the reports and explain how to generate and view them in the Administration and Monitoring Website.

segment.target: Viewing MBAM 2.5 Reports – Configuration Manager Integration topology

segment.source: The topic in this section describes the reports for the Configuration Manager Integration topology and explains how to view them in the Configuration Manager console.
segment.target: The topic in this section describes the reports for the Configuration Manager Integration topology and explains how to view them in the Configuration Manager console.
